europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 61. New data on taxonomy and nomenclature of the Common Sand Martin Riparia riparia (Linnaeus, 1758) and the Pale Sand Martin R. diluta (Sharpe & Wyatt, 1893)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Loskot V.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Riparia riparia
Riparia diluta
diagnostic characters
types
europeana:record.dc:description: The main diagnostic characters of Riparia riparia and R. diluta are discussed based on fresh examinations of extensive material. The opinion of Zarudny that his subspecies innominata belongs to R. riparia is validated, but the series of syntypes of R. riparia innominata includes birds of both these sand martin species, and a lectotype is designated for R. r. innominata Zarudny 1916.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 61. New data on taxonomy and nomenclature of the Common Sand Martin Riparia riparia (Linnaeus, 1758) and the Pale Sand Martin R. diluta (Sharpe & Wyatt, 1893) (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 80-5)
